title: Braq
description: Khirbet Braq is the modern name of a ruined Nabatean sanctuary at Ayn Braq in Jordan, a spring that, in antiquity, was channeled through an aqueduct to supply ancient Petra. The heavily looted site is located just south of modern Wadi Musa, on the west side of the modern road to Taybeh.

properties.description: Location determined in Google Earth with reference to Abudnah 2018 and Hamarneh 2023.
properties.title: Imagery Location of Khirbet Braq
